TopicTitle: Kebal calendar mod/Mission elapse time mod?

Articles.Content: Any mod that gives the real calendar view so you can schedule crew/resource transfers & any mission elapse timer mod?

It doesn't have a calendar view (that I know of), but KAC will do all those, and a lot lot more already.  You can set an alarm on a ship without a node established, and then have it repeat every x days.  Get KAC and play with it's functionality.  There's a lot of things in that mod. 

NOt sure what you mean by a MET mod though...
